Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1988...
Traded from Los Angeles to Pittsburgh on 7/14/1989 (Going to LA: P J. Key. Going to PIT: C J. Lopez)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1992, off Mike Williams (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1992, off David Cone (STL)...
Hit 3 homeruns against St. Louis, driving in 5 runs on 8/1/1992...
Injured on 5/26/1993 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
